snippet.title: Switchero - Dash n' retry - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
SWITCHERO is now available on iOS and Android!
https://itunes.apple.com/app/switchero/id1293757483?mt=8
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.busybreaks.switchero

SWITCHERO is a challenging free arcade game inspired by retro platformers.
Test your reflexes with its unique mix of runner and space shooter gameplay!

Simple 2-touch gameplay to jump, switch or teleport through tough levels and haunting soundtracks. Can you beat every boss and reach the end to become the new switch hero?

Features:

• Unique mix of runner and space shooter gameplay
• Immersive synthwave soundtracks
• Beautiful world-switching mechanism
• Teleport, swing, slow time and much more
• Shoot and dodge your way through each level boss
• 70+ achievements to unlock

Trailer song:
Major Chase Matrix by Dj-Rec0il: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/744074

Website: http://www.busybreaks.com
Facebook: https://facebook.com/busybreaks
Twitter: https://twitter.com/busybreaks
